The image was published on Instagram by: a prominent lawmaker in the ruling Bharatiya Janata Party, with a caption mentioning the Indian flag at Lal Chowk in Srinagar.
A reverse image search on Yandex reveale: indicating a potential lack of authenticity.
Testimonies from an AFP stringer in Srin: along with a photo from Getty Images, confirmed that no Indian flag was raised at Lal Chowk on the claimed date.
